context: The word 'allapoole' is an Estonian adverb and preposition that means downward, down, below, or lower. As an adverb, it indicates movement in a downward direction relative to something higher up (antonym: ülespoole - upward). As a preposition, it indicates position relative to something else being lower than reference point. It can refer to physical space (spatially lower) or abstract levels/amounts (lower values).
